attributes.additional_details: Murders are becoming increasingly common and horrific and young men are stabbing their peers and young children are being horrifically murdered.
attributes.background: Bring back capital punishment because I feel there are too many murderers getting short sentences.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Bring back the death penalty for homicide of a child
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709710

Hold a referendum on restoring the Death Penalty for murder
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709623
